short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to view PVR (zPVR) and BC7 texture. Adds PVR-View tab in DevTool (F12)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For viewing *.pvr and *.bc7 files loaded on web page or from local file.
After opening page you should open DevTool (press F12) and find there new tab "PVR-View".
Then choose loaded *.pvr or *.bc7 from list. 
If you don't see needed *.pvr or *.bc7 file in list, probably DevTool opened after this file was loaded in the web page. Reload page with opened DevTool.

Or you can open your *.pvr, *.bc7 local file.
